verses.verse: And he said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Come <WH5927> up to the LORD, <WH3068> you, and Aaron, <WH175> Nadab, <WH5070> and Abihu, <WH30> and seventy <WH7657> of the elders <WH2205> of Israel; <WH3478> and worship <WH7812> you afar <WH7350> off.

And Moses <WH4872> alone <WH905> shall come <WH5066> near <WH5066> the LORD: <WH3068> but they shall not come <WH5066> near; <WH5066> neither <WH3808> shall the people <WH5971> go <WH5927> up with him.

And Moses <WH4872> came <WH935> and told <WH5608> the people <WH5971> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of the LORD, <WH3068> and all <WH3605> the judgments: <WH4941> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> answered <WH6030> with one <WH259> voice, <WH6963> and said, <WH559> All <WH3605> the words <WH1697> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> has said <WH1696> will we do. <WH6213>

And Moses <WH4872> wrote <WH3789> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of the LORD, <WH3068> and rose <WH7925> up early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> and built <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> under <WH8478> the hill, <WH2022> and twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> pillars, <WH4676> according to the twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> tribes <WH7626> of Israel. <WH3478>

And he sent <WH7971> young <WH5288> men of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which offered <WH5927> burnt <WH5930> offerings, and sacrificed <WH2076> peace <WH8002> offerings <WH2077> of oxen <WH6499> to the LORD. <WH3068>

And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> half <WH2677> of the blood, <WH1818> and put <WH7760> it in basins; <WH101> and half <WH2677> of the blood <WH1818> he sprinkled <WH2236> on <WH5921> the altar. <WH4196>

And he took <WH3947> the book <WH5612> of the covenant, <WH1285> and read <WH7121> in the audience <WH241> of the people: <WH5971> and they said, <WH559> All <WH3605> that the LORD <WH3068> has said <WH1696> will we do, <WH6213> and be obedient. <WH8085>

And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> the blood, <WH1818> and sprinkled <WH2236> it on <WH5921> the people, <WH5971> and said, <WH559> Behold <WH2009> the blood <WH1818> of the covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> has made <WH3772> with you concerning <WH5921> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words. <WH1697>
Then went <WH5927> up Moses, <WH4872> and Aaron, <WH175> Nadab, <WH5070> and Abihu, <WH30> and seventy <WH7657> of the elders <WH2205> of Israel: <WH3478>

And they saw <WH7200> the God <WH430> of Israel: <WH3478> and there was under <WH8478> his feet <WH7272> as it were a paved <WH3840> work <WH4639> of a sapphire <WH5601> stone, and as it were the body <WH6106> of heaven <WH8064> in his clearness. <WH2892>
And on the nobles <WH678> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> he laid <WH7971> not his hand: <WH3027> also they saw <WH2372> God, <WH430> and did eat <WH398> and drink. <WH8354>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Come <WH5927> up to me into the mount, <WH2022> and be there: <WH8033> and I will give <WH5414> you tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> and a law, <WH8451> and commandments <WH4687> which <WH834> I have written; <WH3789> that you may teach <WH3384> them.
And Moses <WH4872> rose <WH6965> up, and his minister <WH8334> Joshua: <WH3091> and Moses <WH4872> went <WH5927> up into <WH413> the mount <WH2022> of God. <WH430>

And he said <WH559> to the elders, <WH2205> Tarry <WH3427> you here <WH2088> for us, until <WH5704> we come <WH7725> again <WH7725> to you: and, behold, <WH2009> Aaron <WH175> and Hur <WH2354> are with you: if any man <WH1167> have any matters <WH1697> to do, <WH1167> let him come <WH5066> to them.
And Moses <WH4872> went <WH5927> up into <WH413> the mount, <WH2022> and a cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> the mount. <WH2022>

And the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> stayed <WH7931> on mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> and the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> it six <WH8337> days: <WH3117> and the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> he called <WH7121> to Moses <WH4872> out of the middle <WH8432> of the cloud. <WH6051>

And the sight <WH4758> of the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> was like devouring <WH398> fire <WH784> on the top <WH7218> of the mount <WH2022> in the eyes <WH5869> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And Moses <WH4872> went <WH935> into the middle <WH8432> of the cloud, <WH6051> and got <WH5927> him up into <WH413> the mount: <WH2022> and Moses <WH4872> was in the mount <WH2022> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights. <WH3915>
